Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory173.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier A', 3: 'Mr. Watanabe, the number of Corrupted coming from the outer rim are decreasing, but...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "They're now pouring out of the city instead, eh.", 4: '1'}

{3: 'After the Forsaken got off the vehicle, they made a temporary encampment on a nearby route to intercept the enemy. Though they are only forty or so in numbers, to these veterans, it is more than enough.'}
{3: 'Corrupted remains are scattered all over the ground. Watanabe tells his men to salvage the still usable supplies, and he peers at Kowloong Corp in the distance.'}
{3: '——What made Kowloong build such a metropolis?'}
{3: 'The sight is grandiose and consuming, but to Watanabe it borders on a sickly obsession. Home is comfort, but shelter too deep, and it becomes a prison.'}
{3: 'Watanabe knows that this imposing city will not have many places to house people. Even the shops are likely not in use.'}
{3: 'The stately streets are fossils, left only to remind themselves of a lost, golden age.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier B', 3: "Mr. Watanabe, I wonder when we'll get to settle down...", 4: '3'}
{3: 'A comrade close by asks a question, and Watanabe glances over.'}
{3: 'Settling down in the current world is but an extravagant hope. Normally, people know not to dream about it—delusions dull your blade.'}
{3: 'And so Watanabe responds, flipping the knife in his hand, pointing it at the throat of the one who asked the question.'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier A', 3: 'Mr. Watanabe?!', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier B', 3: 'Um... What are you doing?', 4: '3'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Don't come any closer! Keep your distance!", 4: '1'}
{3: "They do not understand the situation, but the Forsaken immediately back away as per Watanabe's orders, leaving only Watanabe and the person he just saw through together."}
{2: '???', 3: 'And here I thought I was putting on a great act...', 4: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: '——How could this man be so keen? Lamia, who would have preferred to avoid confrontation, sheds her illusion and returns to her original form.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You are an Ascendant, aren't you? What are you trying to do by sneaking in here?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: "I just wanted to pad my results a little... But now... Looks like that's not happening...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'If I say sorry, will you... let me go, pops?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You owe me one.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lamia', 3: 'Really? Yay! You can have the Corrupted I brought with me! Do whatever you like to them.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Thanks for the trouble.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory173.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'Mr. Watanabe, should we have let go of that Ascendant?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We can't win against her now. With her prowess in stealth, if she had intended massacre...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "...I'm sorry. We held you back, Mr. Watanabe.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Whatever it is, don't let down your guard! The enemy can come from anywhere!", 4: '1'}
